title: So Riot, the game has been out for TEN YEARS! Why doesn't it tell you if you've disconnected?
body: I just sat on the loading screen at 100% wondering why your shitty game wouldn't finish loading. Turns out my game just stopped working for no reason, showed no indication that it had done so, and immediately started the game for everybody else. Missed the first 4 minutes of the game, which are the most important minutes in your snowballing damage fest of a game you've got here, and had to suffer through a 4 level higher enemy literally chasing me through multiple towers to prevent me from playing the game.
